changelog.title: Fixed
items: Should animate avatars in chat again!

defaultConfig.name: Autoplay Chat
defaultConfig.note: Autoplays avatars in the chat area for Nitro users.

defaultConfig.name: Autoplay Memberlist
defaultConfig.note: Autoplays avatars in the member list for Nitro users.

defaultConfig.name: Autoplay Guilds
defaultConfig.note: Autoplays guild icons in the guild list for servers that have been boosted.

defaultConfig.name: Activity Status
defaultConfig.note: Autoplays emojis and icons in the activity status like in the member list.
